@robpenner @kristoferjoseph @destroytoday Won't this have the same problem with multiple arguments of the same type as the original system?
@kristoferjoseph @destroytoday @robpenner All very quick and dirty I'm afraid - no tests and doesn't support GuardedSignals, but it works :)
@fljot Because SignalCommand extends Command which defines execute() with no arguments so it can't be redefined in a child

Pull mode in #flextrine abandoned and replaced with a beautiful commit and rollback system
Bidirectional relationship management in #flextrine seems to be working out so far....
Starting to implement the ideas for Flextrine drunkenly discussed at 2am at #gotoAndSki.  Also trying to use this Twitter thing a bit more.
#gotoandski Good work @fcolaco and @almeidavid for running such a great event, and thanks to attendees for being fun to hang out with
Getting all excited about #gotoAndSki
#FDT #gotoAndSki Pray to the snow gods for a big dump and sunshine...
Just booked my ticket for what looks like the most fun AS3 conference ever!  http://switzerland.gotoandski.com/
#fotb @cyriakharris is a very brilliant, very strange man
@ubelly ha! that's awesome. I'll link to it from my blog then immediately have a haircut :)
elevator pitch rehearsal b4 #fotb... worried that any benefit will be outweighed by having had to get up at 6.30 :(
#fotb some banging techno dubstep coming out of André Michelle's session
@mcorlan 2 bugs affecting Flextrine are still outstanding but I've submitted patches for both so hopefully it will be in next release
#fotb Robotlegs and signals - very interesting talk on quite a complex subject
Last night someone at #fotb explained to me what a Twitter hash tag is. Suddenly it all makes a bit more sense...
Flash on the Beach approaches!
Flextrine's changeover from AMFPHP to ZendAMF is almost complete!
Flextrine 0.6.5 released
Doctrine 2 release pushed back from 1st September http://www.doctrine-project.org/blog/doctrine2-orm-beta3
Flextrine 0.6.1 released with merge(), detach(), better server-side configuration and various bug fixes
as3-signals are a beautiful thing
EntityManager merge() and detach() committed to the Flextrine trunk.  That should now be the full set of ORM methods implemented
Flextrine officially working on Android 2.2 Froyo
The world's first step by step Flextrine tutorial! http://www.actionscriptdeveloper.co.uk & choose Flextrine tutorial in featured blogs
Working on a few Flextrine tutorials to demonstrate basic CRUD and association mapping.  Keep an eye on www.actionscriptdeveloper.co.uk
Flextrine 0.5.3 released which runs properly against Doctrine 2 trunk, and remains fully compatible with previous versions.
Doctrine 2 trunk changes to UnitOfWork.php (Improved entity state detection) have broken Flextrine - for now use BETA2 package.
Getting my presentation together for FOTB and have discovered www.prezi.com which is way more fun than good old Powerpoint!
Still reeling from a incredibly emotional Regina Sector gig at Montreux Jazz Festival
Playing with RobotLegs http://www.robotlegs.org/ and so far loving it
Flextrine 0.5.2 is now available with support for MAMP on OSX
The big news is the release of my open-source Flex ORM library, Flextrine.  Check it out at www.flextrine.com
Flash on the beach have recommended that I start using this for code related stuff, so expect more professionalism from this moment on!
Saw Fat Freddy's drop in Auckland, they were wicked
Jumping out of a plane in t minus 30 minutes. Bricking it
White water rafting down a 7 metre waterfall. Hooray!
On my way to the most active volcano in new zealand. Magma...
Gone fishing again. Will continue to go fishing till i catch a fish
Our roadtrip was temporarily halted whilst a kilometer long train of cows crossed the state highway
Cosying up in the van on the seafront with a storm raging outside.
Was involved in some art featuring our van, a shadow of an upside down bicycle and three drunkards clambouring around on top of a car
In Napier, a strange art deco town. Feels a little like being in Bioshock, will watch out for killer mutants
Dave has gone fishing
I have faced my fear by going to a honey factory and dressing up as a bee
Woke up at 8am and drove 120km to a waterpark which as it turns out doesn't open for another week.
